org.jvoicexml.interpreter.event
Class JVoiceXmlEventHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.jvoicexml.interpreter.event.JVoiceXmlEventHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventObserver, EventHandler
public final class JVoiceXmlEventHandler
extends Object
implements EventHandler

Event handler to catch events generated from the ImplementationPlatform.
